modName: Steel Plate Redux - Helmet and Armor
summary: Refits the Steel Plate Armor to make it more \"armorly\".
descriptionHtml:
Supports both male and female.


I really wanted to like the Steel Plate Armor. But I don\'t. So I did this!

The main edits are to the helmet.

-The whole thing has been widened.
-The back flap has been shortened.
-The eyes have been given a more angular/intimidating shape.
-The face guard has been lowered to cover the chin.
-The top \"fin\" has been lowered.
-Various other small edits.

The body of the armor.

-Most notably, the pauldrons have been extended and widened.
-The waist has been pulled in to give a more fitted look.
-The chest has been pulled out and up.
-The leggings had been pulled away from the thighs slightly to give them more of a robust look.
author: Kyim
